properties.name: A Likely Story Children's Bookstore
properties.description: Posted by Libraryann   1555 King St; 22314A fabulous independent children\'s bookstore in historic Old Town Alexandria since 1983.

properties.name: Battista's Hole in the Wall Italian Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Libraryann 4041 Audrie St; Las Vegas, NVAn old Las Vegas landmark, located off the Strip, this is one of my favorite Las Vegas places.

properties.name: Bennington College
properties.description: Posted by LibraryannBennington College; Bennington, VTIt\'s only fitting that such a small, liberal, and thoroughly unique place as Bennington College could not be found on the map. Even though it has an address. Go figure.

properties.name: Boston Athenaeum
properties.description: Posted by Libraryann  10 Beacon St; Boston, MA 02108One of the oldest continuously used libraries in America, the Boston Athenaeum is a private membership library in the heart of Boston. Collections specialize in the humanities. The Athenaeum also features a fine collection of original 18th and 19th century American paintings, busts, and modern works and a rotating exhibition gallery.

properties.name: Boulder Bookstore
properties.description: Posted by Libraryann 1107 Pearl St; Boulder, COA cool and cozy retreat from the bustle of touristy Pearl St.

properties.name: Denver Public Library Central Branch
properties.description: Posted by Libraryann 10 W. 14th Ave Pkwy; Denver, COA favorite library with cool events, this library is ranked as the 3rd best in the nation!

properties.name: Little America, Wyoming
properties.description: Posted by LibraryannLittle America, WY 82929An all-inclusive, tidy little stop in the middle-of-nowhere Wyoming. Kind of great, kind of creepy.

properties.name: New York Public Library (the original)
properties.description: Posted by Libraryann 5th ave and 42nd st; new yorkNestled between the lions, on the most famous street in America, this is the original and awesome best public library in New York!

properties.name: Our House
properties.description: Posted by Libraryannw 37th ave and Federal; 80211Our house is in this vicinity (for security I will not pinpoint our address).

properties.name: Politics and Prose Bookstore
properties.description: Posted by Libraryann 5015 Connecticut Ave; Washington, D.C.A mainstay of the literary community of Washington, D.C.

properties.name: Powell's City of Books
properties.description: Posted by Libraryann1005 W Burnside; portland, orMecca for booklovers, this is a used and new bookstore that cannot be out-done.

properties.name: Seattle Public Library Central Branch
properties.description: Posted by Johndoe 1000 4th Ave., Seattle, WA, United States

properties.name: Simmons College Graduate School of Library & Information Science
properties.description: Posted by Libraryann 300 Fenway; 02115My alma mater - a great place to learn how to be a librarian!

properties.name: St. Louis Public Library (Central Branch)
properties.description: Posted by Libraryann 1301 Olive St; St. Louis, MOWhen traveling, it is always useful to stop at the local library to use the Internet. I found the St. Louis Library\'s Internet waiting system very time consuming, and thus, spent quite a bit of time in the library during my brief stop in St. Louis. It is a beautiful old building.

properties.name: Tattered Cover Bookstore
properties.description: Posted by Libraryann 2955 E 1st Ave; Denver, COArguably the nation\'s best independent bookstore (Powell\'s is the hot competition), the Tattered Cover is a huge and beautifully proportioned space in a popular Denver shopping district. They will be moving house to a new neighborhood in June 2006. Stay tuned for the new map.

properties.name: The Breakers
properties.description: Posted by Libraryann   Ruggles Ave and Ochre Point; Newport, RIThe most fabulous of the Newport "summer cottages", The Breakers was built by the Vanderbilt family at the turn of the 20th century and is a sumptuous museum that is open to the public today. It\'s especially gorgeous when decorated for Christmas.

properties.name: Tir na nOg (Irish Pub)
properties.description: Posted by Libraryann 366a Somerville Ave, Somerville, 02143 I spent a grand evening at this little Irish Pub with some good friends who live in Somerville, Mass. Awesome live music.

properties.name: Village Books
properties.description: Posted by Libraryann 1200 11th st; bellingham, waMy hometown favorite in Bellingham, WA, this is a wonderful and cozy bookstore (even in the new building).

properties.name: Woodbury Branch Library
properties.description: Posted by Libraryann3265 Federal Blvd; 80211This is my local branch library, the one to which I go most often.
